metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3153 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: [service monitor MAC flow is not rate limited]

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-07-10, there does not appear to be a fix available from the upstream ovn project for this issue, marking as deferred

criterions.comment: ovn package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-10').
